CustomField.description: BODEV-355: adds the ‘Current ARR’ (from account), and the ARR of the opportunity
CustomField.formula:
Account.Current_ARR__c + IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost") || Contract_IsActive__c, 0, ARR_manual__c)
/* If Contract is active, ARR for the Opp is already included in Current ARR. If Lost, ARR for the Opp should not be included. */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Adds the ‘Current ARR’ (from account), and the ARR of the opportunity (if the Opp is lost, then simply returns Current ARR).
CustomField.label: Total ARR incl. This Opp
